preWorkoutStretches.name: Band Pull-Aparts
preWorkoutStretches.tips: Activates rear delts, opens chest. Use light resistance

preWorkoutStretches.name: Scapular Wall Slides
preWorkoutStretches.tips: Stand with back against wall, slide arms up/down. Primes shoulder blade movement for pulls

postWorkoutStretches.name: Quad Stretch
postWorkoutStretches.tips: Stand on one leg, pull heel to butt. Hit after hack squats

postWorkoutStretches.name: Pigeon Pose
postWorkoutStretches.tips: Deep hip opener, glute stretch. Crucial after squats

postWorkoutStretches.name: Seated Hamstring Stretch
postWorkoutStretches.tips: One leg extended, reach toward toes

postWorkoutStretches.name: Doorway Chest Stretch
postWorkoutStretches.tips: Arm at 90 degrees against doorframe, lean forward. Opens chest after pressing

postWorkoutStretches.name: Child's Pose
postWorkoutStretches.tips: Stretches lats, shoulders, lower back. Great after pulldowns

postWorkoutStretches.name: Tricep Overhead Stretch
postWorkoutStretches.tips: Reach arm overhead, pull elbow behind head. Targets triceps after extensions

postWorkoutStretches.name: Lat Stretch on Pull-up Bar
postWorkoutStretches.tips: Hang from bar, let one arm stretch while other supports. Deep lat stretch after rows/pulldowns

postWorkoutStretches.name: Thread the Needle
postWorkoutStretches.tips: On all fours, thread one arm under body. Stretches shoulders and upper back

exercises.name: Single-Leg RDL
exercises.tips: Hinge at hips, keep back flat, drive through standing heel. Focus on balance and glute activation. 8 reps each leg

exercises.name: Hack Squats
exercises.tips: Full range of motion - get as deep as possible. Slow descent, control the eccentric. Stance shoulder-width, feet slightly out

exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns (MAG grip or wide)
exercises.tips: Pull elbows down and back. Allow shoulders to elevate at top for full lat stretch. Control the eccentric

exercises.name: Incline DB Press
exercises.tips: 30-45 degree bench angle. Full range of motion, press at slight angle inward. Keep shoulders back

exercises.name: Seated Cable Rows
exercises.tips: Squeeze shoulder blades together at end. Keep chest up, slight lean back. Control the return

exercises.name: DB Hammer Curls
exercises.tips: Neutral grip throughout. No swinging. Control the eccentric, squeeze at top

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extension (rope)
exercises.tips: Keep elbows up and close to head. Full stretch at bottom, full extension at top. No elbow flare

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.tips: Pull to face level, external rotation at end. Squeeze rear delts and upper back. Keep elbows high
